author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Resumes all scans inputted as an array. Will resume scans whose status is 'Paused'.
commands.name: tenable-io-resume-scan

commands.description:
Export and download a scan report.
Scan results older than 35 days are supported in Nessus and CSV formats only, and filters cannot be applied.
Scans that are actively running cannot be exported (run "tenable-io-list-scans" to view scan statuses).
commands.name: tenable-io-export-scan

commands.description: Retrieves details for the specified asset including custom attributes.
commands.name: tenable-io-get-asset-details

commands.description: Launches a scan with existing or custom targets. You can specify custom targets in the command arguments.
commands.name: tenable-io-launch-scan

commands.description: Retrieves details for the specified asset to include custom attributes.
commands.name: tenable-io-export-vulnerabilities

commands.description: Lists the individual runs of the specified scan.
commands.name: tenable-io-get-scan-history

commands.description: Retrieves scans from the Tenable platform.
commands.name: tenable-io-list-scans

commands.description: Lists the filtering, sorting, and pagination capabilities available for scan records on endpoints/commands that support them.
commands.name: tenable-io-list-scan-filters

commands.description: Retrieves details for the specified vulnerability.
commands.name: tenable-io-get-vulnerability-details

commands.description: Retrieves details for the specified asset to include custom attributes.
commands.name: tenable-io-export-assets

commands.description: Pauses all scans inputted as an array. Will pause scans whose status is 'Running'.
commands.name: tenable-io-pause-scan

commands.description: Gets a list of up to 5000 of the vulnerabilities recorded for a specified asset.
commands.name: tenable-io-get-vulnerabilities-by-asset

commands.description: Checks the status of a specific scan using the scan ID. Possible values: "Running", "Completed", and "Empty" (Ready to run).
commands.name: tenable-io-get-scan-status

commands.description: Retrieves a scan report for the specified scan.
commands.name: tenable-io-get-scan-report

integration.description: A comprehensive asset-centric solution to accurately track resources while accommodating dynamic assets such as cloud, mobile devices, containers, and web applications.
integration.name: Tenable.io

description: A comprehensive asset centric solution to accurately track resources while accommodating dynamic assets such as cloud, mobile devices, containers and web applications.
name: Tenable.io
readme:
Tenable.io is a comprehensive asset centric solution to accurately track resources while accommodating dynamic assets such as cloud, mobile devices, containers and web applications.
The Tenable.io Cortex XSOAR pack helps organizations automate their scans and vulnerability management processes, reducing response times and improving their ability to manage security risks effectively. The pre-built integrations and playbooks provide a quick and easy way to get started with Tenable.io and Cortex XSOAR, and can be customized to meet the specific needs of an organization.
Use the Tenable.io integration to manage scans and to view assets.

## What does this pack do
Among other things, this integration enables you to:

- Initiate vulnerability scans on demand.
- Manage vulnerability scans including launch, pause and resume scans.
- Get details about assets.
- Get scans status and report.
- Export assets in Tenable.io based on various criteria.
- Export vulnerabilities in Tenable.io based on various criteria.
